title: Kerberos, automatic user
body: I want the WSL to automatically make a unix user for my windows user, (kerberos) and I want it to automatically log me in as that user unless I specify otherwise.

comments.body: I would love that. It would be nice if wsl could use the windows kerberos ticket cache to authenticate with other domain services as well.
It is only possible when your Windows username also meets Unix username rules.
